column1: Great add-on - Positive, Easy to assemble - Positive, compatible with other eket combinations - Neutral.
Great product - Positive, Huge design flaw - Negative, missing door - Negative, comes only in white - Neutral (in US context).
Easy assembly - Positive, clear instructions - Positive.
Difficult assembly - Negative, pre drilled white things - Negative, looked like crap - Negative, faulty units - Negative.
Works great - Positive, displays things - Positive, natural color - Positive.
